#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int arr[4] = {0}, num, i, j;
	while (scanf("%d", &num) != EOF)
	{
		arr[3] = num;
		for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
		{
			for (j = 0; j < 3 - i; j++)
			{
				if (arr[j] < arr[j + 1])
				{
					int temp;
					temp = arr[j];
					arr[j] = arr[j + 1];
					arr[j + 1] = temp;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if (arr[2] != 0)
		printf("%d\n", arr[2]);
	return 0;
}
